headline: Why Is Exelon Corporation (EXC) Among the Best Electricity Utility Stocks to Invest In Now?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Best Electric Utility Stocks To Invest In. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Exelon Corporation (NASDAQ:EXC) stands against the other electric utility stocks. Utilities have historically been seen as defensive assets, so the combination of strong economic growth, technological excitement, and higher […]

headline: ComEd Receives National Recognition for Two Energy Efficiency Programs that Help Customers Save Money and Energy
summary: CHICAGO, November 07, 2024--ComEd today announced that two of its energy efficiency offerings – Home Energy Savings (HES) and Strategic Energy Management (SEM) – were recognized with Leaders of the Pack awards from the American Council for an Energy-Efficient Economy (ACEEE), a national nonprofit organization focused on advancing energy-efficiency policies that help customers reduce waste while combatting climate change. The two awards were among only 10 utility-funded, energy efficiency program
